author: cms-sw
body: We had stopped building cuda/romc backends of alpaka for extra micro-archs of MULTIARCHS/SKYLAKE IBs. Thsi caused runtime issue as the `lib/arch/microarch/.edmplugin` is a symlink to `lib/arch/.edmplugin` and CMS FW was trying to load the `CudaAsync.so` libs from the ``lib/arch/microarch` ( as the `lib/arch/microarch/.edmplugin`  still had the ref to it). The buildrule update fixes these issue and instead of creaing symlink it now properly creates a separate `.edmplugincache` file for each  `lib/arch/microarch/.edmplugin`
title: BuildRule: Fix emdplugin cache for multiarch builds
